ModMetaData.name: QualityInsights
ModMetaData.author: Omni
ModMetaData.description:
Quality log + live quality odds + optional dev cheat to force the highest tier with ≥ configurable probability (default 2%).
• Logs every crafted/built item with: pawn, skill and level, quality, inspiration/specialist, time, and time-ago. • Shows live Excellent/Masterwork/Legendary chances (sampled from the games actual quality algorithm) on work tables. • Optional dev cheat: always pick the highest tier whose chance ≥ threshold. Legendary still requires legal bumps (Inspiration/Production Specialist).
